trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that the change occurred in.
The areas of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> that contain changes.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change" /> event of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObjectChangeHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObjectChangeHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler method is called whenever the event occurs unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每次事件发生时，除非移除了该委托调用事件处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change> event, add text to one of the cells in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> and then press ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 若要引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.Change>事件，将文本添加到中的单元格之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>然后按 ENTER。
